hadiths.text: Abu al-Sha’tha said :we were sitting with Abu Hurairah in the mosque. A man went out of the mosque after the ADHAN for the afternoon prayer had been called. Abu Hurairah said: As regards this (man), he disobeyed Abu al-Qasim, the prophet (ﷺ)

chapter.ara-name: باب الْخُرُوجِ مِنَ الْمَسْجِدِ بَعْدَ الأَذَانِ
chapter.eng-name: Leaving The Masjid After The Adhan
